display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (Non-Supine): (Apneas with >= 5% oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and with >= 5% oxygen desaturation used and with or without arousal) / hour of sleep in non-supine from type I polysomnography
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-supine body position associated with >= 5% desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60*(hrop5 +   hnrop5 + carop5 + canop5 + oarop5 + oanop5 + marop5 + manrop5)/(remepop+nremepop)
